name: Step On It
overview: Step On It is a "collect 'em up" game in which you play a boot that must collect little yellow objects in each cell of the gameplay area. However there is a giant yellow monster that will kill you if you touch it, or if it catches you. Sort of a weird cross between Q*Bert and Pac-Man. This game was developed by Penny DeGroff and published by Ion International, Inc. in Ahoy! 1986/08 (Issue #32)
